metadata.title: AI Leadership Engineering Roadmap
metadata.description: Step-by-step guide to becoming an AI engineering leader in 2025-2026

nodes.title: Master Advanced Python & Math
nodes.description: Deep dive into advanced Python patterns, data structures, algorithms, and mathematical foundations for AI
learningObjectives: Implement 10+ advanced data structures from scratch
Solve 50+ LeetCode medium/hard problems
Apply linear algebra & calculus concepts in code

resources.title: Python 3 Programming (Coursera Specialization)
resources.description: Comprehensive Python specialization covering fundamentals to advanced concepts, data structures, and algorithms.

resources.title: Building with Code: Programming (Coursera Specialization)
resources.description: Hands-on programming specialization focusing on building real applications with code.

resources.title: Mathematics for Machine Learning (Coursera Specialization)
resources.description: Comprehensive mathematical foundations for machine learning including linear algebra, multivariate calculus, and PCA.

resources.title: Codecademy Python Track
resources.description: Interactive Python course with hands-on coding exercises and projects.

resources.title: Khan Academy Math & Stats
resources.description: Free comprehensive mathematics and statistics courses.

nodes.title: Solve Algorithmic Challenges
nodes.description: Apply algorithmic thinking to solve complex computational problems efficiently
learningObjectives: Complete 75+ algorithmic challenges across categories
Optimize solutions for time/space complexity
Document solution approaches and trade-offs

nodes.title: üèÜ Deliver: GitHub Stats CLI Tool
nodes.description: Build a professional CLI tool that generates beautiful statistical analysis cards from GitHub data
learningObjectives: CLI with multiple output formats (JSON, CSV, visual cards)
90%+ test coverage with CI/CD
Published on PyPI with 10+ downloads
Complete documentation with usage examples

nodes.title: Master Advanced SQL
nodes.description: Master complex SQL queries, optimization, window functions, and database design patterns

resources.title: Google Data Analytics (Coursera Specialization)
resources.description: Comprehensive data analytics specialization covering SQL, data visualization, and analytical thinking.

resources.title: Mode Advanced SQL Tutorial
resources.description: Comprehensive tutorial covering advanced SQL concepts, window functions, and optimization techniques.

resources.title: StrataScratch SQL Practice
resources.description: Real-world SQL interview questions and practice problems from top tech companies.

resources.title: High Performance MySQL: Proven Strategies for Operating at Scale
resources.description: Comprehensive guide to MySQL optimization, covering query performance, server tuning, and scaling strategies.

resources.title: Use The Index, Luke! - SQL Query Optimization Guide
resources.description: In-depth tutorial on SQL query optimization and index usage patterns.

nodes.title: Build Complex Analytical Queries
nodes.description: Practice with real-world complex SQL scenarios and performance optimization

nodes.title: üèÜ Deliver: Automated SQL Reporting Service
nodes.description: Create an automated analytics dashboard powered by complex SQL queries and scheduled reports
learningObjectives: Dashboard with real-time data visualization
Scheduled automated reports via email/Slack
Query performance monitoring and optimization
RESTful API for data access

nodes.title: Master CI/CD & Pro Dev Tools
nodes.description: Master modern development workflows, testing strategies, and CI/CD pipelines

resources.title: Google IT Automation (Coursera Specialization)

resources.title: Introduction to Docker (Coursera Course)

resources.title: Packt Docker and Kubernetes Masterclass (Coursera Specialization)
resources.description: Advanced Docker and Kubernetes specialization for containerization and orchestration.

resources.title: GitHub Actions Documentation
resources.description: Official documentation for GitHub Actions CI/CD workflows.

resources.title: Professional Cloud DevOps Engineer (Google Cloud Skills Boost)
resources.description: Professional certification path for cloud DevOps engineering on Google Cloud Platform.

resources.title: Testing in Production: The Safe Way
resources.description: Strategies for safely testing systems in production environments, including feature flags and canary deployments.

resources.title: Packt Selenium WebDriver 4 with Python (Coursera Specialization)
resources.description: Comprehensive web automation testing with Selenium WebDriver 4 and Python.

nodes.title: Implement Automated Testing Pipelines
nodes.description: Build comprehensive CI/CD pipelines with testing, security, and deployment automation

nodes.title: üèÜ DELIVERABLE: Data Analysis API (Fully Tested with CI/CD)
nodes.description: Build and deploy a production-ready data analysis API with comprehensive testing and CI/CD
learningObjectives: API handles multiple data formats with 99%+ uptime
95%+ test coverage with automated testing
Zero-downtime deployment pipeline
Comprehensive monitoring and alerting
API documentation with interactive examples

nodes.title: Master Advanced RAG & Evaluation
nodes.description: Deep dive into Retrieval-Augmented Generation, vector databases, and evaluation frameworks

resources.title: Elements of AI

resources.title: DeepLearning.AI Short Courses
resources.description: Collection of focused short courses on cutting-edge AI topics including RAG, agents, and prompt engineering.

resources.title: IBM Generative AI Engineering (Coursera Specialization)
resources.description: Comprehensive specialization covering generative AI engineering, deployment, and production practices.

resources.title: Fast.ai Practical Deep Learning
resources.description: Top-down approach to deep learning with practical applications and state-of-the-art techniques.

resources.description: Comprehensive course on transformers, natural language processing, and the Hugging Face ecosystem.

resources.title: CS50's Intro to AI (Harvard)
resources.description: Harvard's introduction to artificial intelligence covering search, knowledge, uncertainty, optimization, learning, and language.

resources.title: Vector Databases: The Complete Guide
resources.description: Comprehensive guide to vector databases, embeddings, and similarity search for RAG applications.

nodes.title: Engineer Multi-Modal RAG Pipelines
nodes.description: Build advanced RAG systems with multi-modal inputs and sophisticated retrieval mechanisms

nodes.title: üèÜ Deliver: Cognitive Load Reducer App
nodes.description: Build an AI-powered app that reduces cognitive load by intelligently summarizing and contextualizing information
learningObjectives: App processes multiple document types (PDF, web, text)
Sub-2-second response times for queries
User satisfaction score >4.5/5
Handles 100+ concurrent users

nodes.title: Master Multi-Agent Orchestration

resources.title: CrewAI Framework Documentation

nodes.description: Implement sophisticated multi-agent systems using CrewAI or similar frameworks

resources.description: Africa's largest data science competition platform.

resources.description: Academic competition platform for machine learning and AI research challenges.

learningObjectives: System curates content from 10+ sources
Personalization improves learning outcomes by 30%
Handles multiple learning styles and preferences
Real-time adaptation to user progress

nodes.title: Master MLOps & Efficient AI
nodes.description: Master ML operations, model optimization, monitoring, and lifecycle management

resources.title: MLOps Engineering: Complete Production Course
resources.description: End-to-end MLOps course covering model deployment, monitoring, and production management.

resources.title: Microsoft AI and ML Engineering (Coursera Specialization)
resources.description: Comprehensive specialization covering AI and ML engineering on Microsoft platforms.

resources.title: Google Cloud Networking (Coursera Specialization)
resources.description: Comprehensive networking specialization for Google Cloud Platform infrastructure.

resources.title: Amazon SageMaker Studio Lab

nodes.title: Containerize & Deploy AI Services
nodes.description: Implement containerized AI deployments with comprehensive monitoring and auto-scaling

nodes.title: üèÜ DELIVERABLE: Deployed AI Services (Live Endpoints)
nodes.description: Deploy multiple AI applications with full MLOps pipeline and production monitoring
learningObjectives: 3+ AI services running in production with 99.9% uptime
Automated model deployment and rollback capabilities
Comprehensive monitoring with alerts and dashboards
Load testing demonstrates scalability to 1000+ users
API documentation with live examples

nodes.title: AI Safety: Baseline Fluency
nodes.description: Understand the fundamentals of AI safety, prompt injection, and societal risks.
learningObjectives: Complete all code labs and quizzes
Demonstrate understanding of prompt injection and LLM risks

resources.title: Red Teaming LLM Applications
resources.description: Intro to red teaming for LLMs: code labs, prompt injection, and LLM risks.

resources.title: Generative AI Safety (Google Cloud Skill Boost)
resources.description: Covers prompt injection, data leakage, and GCP tools.

resources.title: AI For Everyone (Coursera, Andrew Ng)
resources.description: Ethics and societal risks, for mindset.

nodes.title: AI Safety: Real-World Attacks & Defenses
nodes.description: Hands-on adversarial attacks and defenses on transformers and LLM deployments.
learningObjectives: Implement at least one adversarial attack and defense
Document findings and mitigation strategies

resources.title: Hugging Face: Adversarial Attacks & Defenses
resources.description: Code adversarial attacks/defenses on transformers.

nodes.title: AI Safety: Specialization & Professional Tools
nodes.description: Credential-focused and advanced tools for consultants and practitioners.
learningObjectives: Complete a credential/masterclass or open-source tool project
Demonstrate advanced red teaming or adversarial ML skills

resources.title: NVIDIA: Exploring Adversarial ML
resources.description: Deep technical weeds‚Äîuse only if specializing.

resources.title: NVIDIA Garak (GitHub)
resources.description: Open-source tool for adversarial testing of LLMs.

nodes.title: Causal Inference Foundations
nodes.description: Build a practical foundation in causal inference, DAGs, and real-world data analysis.
learningObjectives: Complete all code labs and quizzes
Demonstrate understanding of DAGs and causal reasoning

resources.title: Google Cloud Skill Boost: Responsible AI‚ÄîCausal Reasoning
resources.description: Industry/business focus on causal reasoning in AI.

resources.title: Crash Course in Causality (U. Penn, Coursera)
resources.description: Secondary resource, R focus, covers core concepts.

nodes.title: Hands-On Causal Analysis & Domain Integration
nodes.description: Apply causal inference in business, NLP, and A/B testing with real code and datasets.
learningObjectives: Implement at least one causal analysis project
Document findings and business impact

resources.title: Amazon Science: Causal Inference in the Field (YouTube)
resources.description: A/B testing and business impact of causal inference.

nodes.title: Advanced Causal Inference & Strategic Applications
nodes.description: Master's-level frameworks and real-world/medical data applications.
learningObjectives: Complete an advanced causal inference project or research assignment

resources.title: Machine Learning for Healthcare (MIT, edX)
resources.description: Causal inference in real-world/medical data.

nodes.title: Quantum Computing: Conceptual Fluency

learningObjectives: Complete all conceptual modules and quizzes
Demonstrate understanding of quantum computing basics

resources.description: Hands-on labs for quantum computing basics.

resources.title: Quantum Country: Concepts & Flashcards
resources.description: Concepts and flashcards for retention and business impact.

nodes.title: Advanced Quantum ML & Algorithms
nodes.description: Explore advanced quantum computing algorithms for AI and specialization pathways.
learningObjectives: Complete an advanced quantum ML project or research assignment
